abstract: Avraam Papadopoulos (Greek: Αβραάμ Παπαδόπουλος; born 3 December 1984) is an Australian-born Greek footballer who is the captain and plays as a central defender for Olympiakos and the Greek national team. He was born in Melbourne, Australia to Greek parents.
comment: Avraam Papadopoulos (Greek: Αβραάμ Παπαδόπουλος; born 3 December 1984) is an Australian-born Greek footballer who is the captain and plays as a central defender for Olympiakos and the Greek national team. He was born in Melbourne, Australia to Greek parents.
name: Avraam Papadopoulos
